p: Here connectivity – not contact tracing − was emphasized. Two reasons explain this priority: (i) in epidemics with asymptomatic patients (as clearly shown in the ‘Diamond Princess’ cruise case, where 86% of test-positive individuals were asymptomatic) ( CNBC, 2020), control measures that depend on detection of symptomatic patients will likely fail; and (ii) to estimate where the epidemic is going, geo-referenced information on connectivity is needed.
